title: Run Jetha Run: The Chappal Chase
description: Bapuji is Angry! Dodge obstacles and run through the Gokuldham society.

title: Bhide's Sakharam Rush
description: Help Atmaram Tukaram Bhide deliver his famous Madhavi's Achar & Papad on time!

title: Bhide's Discipline Master: Gokuldham Patrol
description: Take charge as the 'Ekmeva Secretary' Bhide. Stop Tapu from breaking windows!

title: Badminton with Babita
description:
Join Babita Ji from TMKOC in a thrilling badminton adventure where you control her rise to glory.
Help her become the ultimate badminton champion of Gokuldham Society!

title: Gokuldham Holi Mahotsav
description:
Get ready for a vibrant Holi adventure with your favorite TMKOC characters!
Pick your pichkari, splash opponents into the water, and unlock new gear for nonstop fun!

title: Jethalal Kite Flying
description:
Soar through the skies with Jethalal in “Jethalal’s Kite Flying”!
Navigate Gokuldham’s colorful skies, cut opponents’ kites, and become the ultimate kite-flying champion.
